subject: Climate & Environment
title: Marine Protected Areas
description: A fast breakdown of Marine Protected Areas for builders.

hook.text: Only about 8% of the ocean is currently protected. Scientists say we need at least 30%.

buildup.text: Marine protected areas ban or limit fishing, drilling, and mining in designated zones.

discovery.text: Inside well-managed MPAs, fish populations double and biodiversity increases significantly.

twist.text: Most existing MPAs allow some fishing. Only 3% of the ocean is fully no-take protected.

climax.text: The 2022 High Seas Treaty opened the door to protecting international waters for the first time.

punchline.text: The ocean needs parks just like the land does. It's finally getting some.

quiz.question: What percentage of the ocean is fully no-take protected?
